weka.core

Class ChartUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.core.ChartUtils

  • public class ChartUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility routines for plotting various charts using the JFreeChart library.
    Version:
    $Revision: 11579 $
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)

      • getHeatMapForMatrix

        public static java.awt.Image getHeatMapForMatrix(Matrix matrix,
                                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> rowAttNames)
        Generates a heat map from a matrix of correlations
        Parameters:
        matrix - a Matrix (expected to hold correlation values between -1 and 1)
        rowAttNames - a list of labels for the columns/rows
        Returns:
        an Image holding the heat map

              java.io.OutputStream dest)
                       throws java.io.IOException

        Parameters:

        dest - the destination output stream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a problem occurs

      • renderHistogramFromSummaryData

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage renderHistogramFromSummaryData(int width,
                                                          int height,
                                                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> bins,
                                                          java.util.List<java.lang.Double> freqs,
                                                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> additionalArgs)
                                                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Render a histogram chart from summary data (i.e. a list of bin labels and corresponding frequencies) to a buffered image
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the resulting image
        height - the height of the resulting image
        bins - the list of bin labels
        freqs - the corresponding bin frequencies
        additionalArgs - optional arguments to the renderer (may be null)
        Returns:
        a histogram as a buffered image
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if a problem occurs

      • renderBoxPlotFromSummaryData

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage renderBoxPlotFromSummaryData(int width,
                                                        int height,
                                                        java.util.List<java.lang.Double> summary,
                                                        java.util.List<java.lang.Double> outliers,
                                                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> additionalArgs)
                                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a box plot buffered image from summary data (mean, median, q1, q3, min, max, minOutlier, maxOutlier, list of outliers)
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the resulting image
        height - the height of the resulting image
        summary - summary data
        outliers - list of outlier values
        additionalArgs - additional options to the renderer
        Returns:
        a box plot chart
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if a problem occurs

      • renderPieChartFromSummaryData

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage renderPieChartFromSummaryData(int width,
                                                         int height,
                                                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> values,
                                                         java.util.List<java.lang.Double> freqs,
                                                         boolean showLabels,
                                                         boolean showLegend,
                                                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> additionalArgs)
                                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Render a pie chart from summary data (i.e. a list of values and their corresponding frequencies) to a buffered image
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the resulting image
        height - the height of the resulting image
        values - a list of values for the chart
        freqs - a list of corresponding frequencies
        showLabels - true if the chart will show labels
        showLegend - true if the chart will show a legend
        additionalArgs - optional arguments to the renderer (may be null)
        Returns:
        a buffered image
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if a problem occurs

        Parameters:

        height - the height of the resulting image
        values - the values for the chart
        freqs - the corresponding frequencies
        additionalArgs - optional arguments to the renderer (may be null)
        Returns:
        a buffered image
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if a problem occurs

      • renderCombinedBoxPlotAndHistogramFromSummaryData

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage renderCombinedBoxPlotAndHistogramFromSummaryData(int width,
                                                                            int height,
                                                                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> bins,
                                                                            java.util.List<java.lang.Double> freqs,
                                                                            java.util.List<java.lang.Double> summary,
                                                                            java.util.List<java.lang.Double> outliers,
                                                                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> additionalArgs)
                                                                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Render a combined histogram and box plot chart from summary data
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the resulting image
        height - the height of the resulting image
        bins - the values for the chart
        freqs - the corresponding frequencies
        summary - the summary stats for the box plot
        outliers - an optional list of outliers for the box plot
        additionalArgs - optional arguments to the renderer (may be null)
        Returns:
        a buffered image
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if a problem occurs

      • createAttributeChartNominal

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage createAttributeChartNominal(Attribute summaryAtt,
                                                       java.lang.String attName,
                                                       java.io.OutputStream dos,
                                                       int width,
                                                       int height)
                                                                throws java.io.IOException
        Creates and writes a combined chart for a nominal attribute given its summary attribute information and an output stream to write to
        Parameters:
        summaryAtt - the summary attribute for the attribute to process
        attName - the name of the attribute
        dos - the output stream to write to (can be null for no write)
        width - the width of the chart
        height - the height of the chart
        Returns:
        a BufferedImage containing the chart
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a problem occurs
